name: Heavenly Martyr
description:
WARNING: This game contains depictions and mentions of Mutilation, Dismemberment, Kidnapping, Death, Sexual Assault and Abuse.
If you suffer from trauma related to any of these subjects, or otherwise find them particularly upsetting, playing this game may not be advisable.

On a fateful day a girl walking home gets the opportunity to change the world for the better. Against all odds and better judgement she takes upon the role of a Martyr, a magical girl bent on purging evil alongside her little friend.

Venture to the streets of England and hunt down those who mean harm to the well being of manking in this black and white world.

  • An average play time of an hour
  • An unique monochrome and red art style.
  • Active Turn Based Combat.
  • Gummy Bears! 
  • A gritty soundtrack

Art and story by: GimpyStuff
Gameplay by: Lumi
Music by: loyaltyfreakmusic.com

Made for the 6th magical girl gamejam
